nodes.text: Tragus Rova was a male Human citizen of the Eternal Empire living during the war against Zakuul. A member of the Knights of Zakuul, following the Coronation of Empress Vaylin he was hand-picked by her to join the new Horizon Guard. He was among the guards who accompanied the Empress and SCORPIO when they used subterfuge to initiate the assault on the Gravestone. After Lana Beniko and the Alliance Commander boarded the Gravestone determined to reclaim the vessel, Vaylin ordered to hunt down the intruders. Tragus Rova located the Commander and Koth Vortena in the power generation room and attacked them, but was defeated and killed.
Tragus Rova appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne Chapter III "Dark Reunions."
